text: The Acheron River is a river in the South Island of New Zealand, in Marlborough and flows into the Clarence River. It flows southwest and then east for a total of , joining the Clarence at the southern end of the Inland Kaikoura mountains. The Alma and Severn Rivers flow into the Acheron before it joins the Clarence. ==See also== *Acheron River (Canterbury) *Acheron (river in Greece) == Références == Category:Rivers of the Marlborough Region Category:Rivers of New Zealand
